# [`table()`]{.blue}
 
 
### [table]{.blue}(*vector(s*)){.center} 
 
# What it does 


+ Make a summary table of a vector or a pair of vectors.
  
 
# Demo code 

```{r}
table(iris$Species)
table(mtcars$cyl, mtcars$vs)
```
  
 
# Usefull stuff 

+ [`table()`]{.blue} does not have a dataset option and it does not label well. 
+ It is well suited for quick checks while debugging.
